AttendanceDescription: Present (AM)
Present (PM)
Approved education activity as pupil being educated off site (not dual registration)
Authorised Attendance as pupil is absent due to other authorised circumstances
Dual registered (at another establishment) - not counted in possible attendances
Authorised Attendance as pupil is excluded, with no alternative provision made
Unauthorised Attendance as pupil is on a family holiday, not agreed, or is taking days in excess of an agreed family holiday
Authorised Attendance due to agreed family holiday
Authorised Attendance due to illness (NOT medical or dental etc. appointments)
Approved education activity as pupil is attending interview
Late (before registers closed) marked as present
Authorised Attendance due to medical/dental appointments
Unauthorised Attendance as pupil missed sessions for a reason that has not yet been provided
Unauthorised Attendance as pupil missed sessions for an unauthorised Attendance not covered by any other code/description
Approved education activity as pupil is attending an approved sporting activity
Authorised Attendance due to religious observance
Authorised Attendance due to study leave
Authorised Attendance due to traveller Attendance
Unauthorised Attendance as pupil arrived after registers closed
Approved education activity as pupil is away on an educational visit or trip
Approved education activity as pupil is attending work experience
Not required to be in school (non-compulsory school age pupil) and not attending in circumstances relating to Coronavirus
Unable to attend due to exceptional circumstances - not counted in possible attendances
Pupil not yet on roll - not counted in possible attendances
Planned whole or partial school closure - not counted in possible attendances
